vote.title: Authorize a construction services contract for the installation of water and wastewater mains at 15 locations (list attached to the Agenda Information Sheet) - Douglas Dailey Construction, LLC, lowest responsible bidder of six - Not to exceed $8,363,025.00 - Financing: Water (Drinking Water) - TWDB 2022 Fund ($5,185,168.15) and Wastewater Capital Improvement F Fund ($3,177,856.85)
